Articles.Content:
Hello, my name is Stephen. I've kinda been playing with Kerbal on and off for about a year. Just bought the Making History expansion this morning and figured it would be a good time to join the community. I started playing Kerbal to experiment with some orbital questions I had for a future technology idea of mine. Anyways I'm wanting to make some new friends here that share similar interests 

BTW I just realized I had older posts here that I forgot about. But I haven't been here in a while so lets start again. lol

Hello @SpaceFaringOrBust and welcome to the KSP Forum!

We have a community with numerous knowledgeable and friendly members who have interests of all sorts.

I hope you find your time spent here enjoyable and informative.


Happy landings!
Welcome Stephen! There's plenty to talk about here in terms of the game itself, and IRL space and tech.
hi and welcome to the forums!

Hello, and welcome!

I'm looking forward to what you post next!

@The_Architect: Welcome (back) to the forum! The only unofficial requirement we have is that you post pictures of your creations. Your vehicles do not have to be pretty. They don't have to conform to any pre-determined plan. They just must be... yours! So, welcome aboard (again) and look forward to seeing you stick around this time.
